title: Register FO-08 in overview page
description:
Add FO-08 to the overview page.

File to modify:
- app/overview/page.tsx

Add this entry to the versions array:

{
  id: 'FO-08',
  name: 'Hybrid Fragments',
  href: '/fo-08',
  tagline: 'Guided expression with direction',
  description: 'Combines FO-06 fragment mechanics with FO-07 discovery framework. Hybrid fragments suggest content direction while inviting personal completion.',
  inputType: 'Hybrid fragments',
  outputType: 'Thumbs up/down',
  highlight: 'Best of FO-06 + FO-07',
},

Do not close this tick until the verification passes.
acceptance_criteria: grep -q 'FO-08' app/overview/page.tsx && grep -q 'Hybrid Fragments' app/overview/page.tsx && echo PASS
closed_reason: Added FO-08 entry to versions array with Hybrid Fragments name and all required fields. Added corresponding row to Quick Comparison table with Medium effort, High (iterative) personalization, None (single review) learning, and Hybrid fragment input best-for.
